scripts.build:bin:linux-x64: bun run scripts/build-web.ts && mkdir -p dist && bun build --compile --minify --target=bun-linux-x64 ./apps/cli/index.ts --outfile dist/agi-linux-x64
scripts.build:bin:linux-arm64: bun run scripts/build-web.ts && mkdir -p dist && bun build --compile --minify --target=bun-linux-arm64 ./apps/cli/index.ts --outfile dist/agi-linux-arm64
